ingredients: 550 grams (20 ounces) head-on sea bass (tilapia, flounder, or other fish with white flesh (*see footnote 1)), scaled, gutted (see footnote 1)
1 and 1/2 pieces thumb sized ginger, 1 thumb sliced, 1/2 thumb julienned (see footnote 2)
1 cup chopped green onion (6 centimeters /2.5 inches in length)
2 tablespoons seasoned soy sauce for seafood
